title: Cô Ấy Nói / 她说
lyrics: Tone gốc: D# (nữ) Capo 3 chơi    Ta jing qiao qiao de lai guo Ta man man dai zou chenmo Zhi shi zuihou de chengnuo Haishi meiyou dai zou le jimo Women ai de meiyou cuo Zhi shi meili de duxiu tai zhemo Ta shuo wo suo wei Zhiyao neng zaiyeli Fan lai fu qu de shihou you jituo Deng bu dao tian hei Yanhuo bu hui tai wanmei Hui ji shao chenghui Haishi deng bu dao jiewei Ta ceng shuo de wu suo wei Wo pa yi tian yi tian bei cuihui Deng bu dao tian hei Bu gan diao xie de hualei Ly ye zai gensui Fangkai ci tong de ziwei Jinhou bu zai pa tian ming Wo xiang zhi shi haipa qingxing Bu pa tian ming Wo xiang zhi shi haipa qingxing
